title: Interchange: A Dead Mars Novel
description: "Mad Max meets The Martian" - Molly Martin, Reedsy Discovery review"Technological virtuosity meets human vulnerability in a brutal post-apocalyptic page-turner set on Mars." - Katri Skala, author of 'A Perfect Mother'"Reminiscent of Philip K. Dick and Isaac Asimov" - Amazon Five Star ReviewIt has been more than 100 years since the fall of the Martian Colonies, but Jude is a survivor. She is one of 'The Clan', a dwindling band that scratches a living from the rubble and she has a plan to give her people a future. Nothing, though, is simple in the time after The Fall. To succeed, Jude must defy friends as well as enemies on a journey into the savage, ghost-infested ruins of the ancient capital of Mars. On the way, she must truly decide who she is, and what it is she stands for. Will she go beyond even death to free herself, and those around her, of the burden of their over mighty past?
author: Garrick Fincham
